ngiemboon: Pi gʉa ńkaa mekwɔ̀ʼɔ ma ńnáa jʉʼɔɔn.
en: Go carry these stools to donate here.
habit that is almost impossible to change

ngiemboon: Má pà má wɔ̀ɔn aa ndÿò tɛʼ.
en: My maternal grandmother is very old.

ngiemboon: Má pà tá we nyě pɔ́ wó.
en: His father's mother is still alive.

ngiemboon: Máa tepwó wɔ̀ɔn fǎŋ ńcʉa mentsě.
en: My thumb is bigger than my little finger.
